dai::fo_divides0

dai::fo_divides0< T > Struct Template Reference

Function object similar to std::divides(), but different in that dividing by zero results in zero. More...

#include <dai/prob.h>

Public Member Functions

T operator() (const T &x, const T &y) const
 Returns (y == 0 ? 0 : (x / y)).

Detailed Description

template<typename T>
struct dai::fo_divides0< T >

Function object similar to std::divides(), but different in that dividing by zero results in zero.

Member Function Documentation
